title: Easy Voice Changer 1.0.3 – Simply Voice Changer Software
content: Adding sound effects to your voice has never been easier. Simply turn on your microphone and your speakers, pick one or more audio filters and press Record or Listen Live. title: Timing 1.5.3 – Discover how you spend time on your Mac
content: Timing is the best way to keep track of the time you spend with your Mac. Find out where your time goes — without ever having to start a timer again!   Timing automatically tracks which documents you are editing, which applications you use, and the domains of the websites you visit. title: Chocolat 3.1.7 – Native Cocoa text editor

title: El Capitan Cache Cleaner 10.0.1 – Clear caches, access hidden OS X settings, and more

title: ON1 Photo 10.0.2241 – Collection of ON1 digital photo products for Photoshop and more

title: Print Window 5.2.2 – Print folder listings from the Finder
content: Print Window offers the ability to print a file listing directly from within the Mac OS X Finder. No more taking screenshots of windows or settling for text-only printouts of filenames only.
